categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Leap is a Lambda-class T-4a shuttle that was used by the Rebel Alliance. The shuttle was onboard the frigate Dodger and was used by Rebel officers.
Leap appears in the Combat chamber Assault Gunboat mission 4. The shuttle was to be launched if the ship was at 50% Hull condition and is to be destroyed as part of a "Bonus" objective.
